column2: You have chosen to subjugate your fellow neighbour rulers to unite your and their kingdoms under one banner. You can attack any independent ruler of your region with a small loss of prestige. Free men are always willing to follow the mightiest ruler...

Adrian seeks the Claw. In a great invasion he landed at its southeastern coast and took the nearby holdings. However, the King of the Claw did not stand still and gathered a host to face his new enemy.
You can subjugate neighboring subrealms of other rulers to expand your power.
